The Fund aims to deliver its investment objective by gaining exposure to companies positioned to benefit from one or more themes (the “Themes”). Such Themes will be derived from three mega trends (aging population, technological innovation and societal change) that have the capacity to change the social, economic and political landscape in the Asia Pacific region (excluding Japan) over the long term.
